name: Cook'nRecipeOrganizer
0:
”Alexa, launch Cook'n Recipe Organizer”
”Alexa, ask Cook'n Recipe Organizer to show me my cookbooks”
”Alexa, ask Cook'n Recipe Organizer to show me my creamy chicken stew recipe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cook'n recipe organizer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Cook'n Recipe Organizer is the most robust, feature-rich...and funnest way to organize and share all of your favorite recipes across your mobile, tablet, PC, Mac, and Alexa devices. Import recipes from Pinterest, Scan recipes, Capture Internet recipes, even speak your recipes and Cook'n Recipe Organizer will organize them for you.

With Cook'n Recipe Organizer, you can search for your recipes and cook hands-free from your Alexa device. Tell Cook'n Recipe Organizer what you have on hand and Cook'n Recipe Organizer will tell you what you can make for dinner.

Cook'n Recipe Organizer is the only recipe app that uses A.I. (Artificial Intelligence) to identify your unique, personal, taste preferences and recommend recipes that are a perfect match for you; making it easy for you to finally answer that age old question—"what's for dinner?"

Cook'n Recipe Organizer will make menu & meal plans and shopping lists with just one tap. Shopping lists are organized by aisle to save you time at the grocery store. Cook'n Recipe Organizer will simplify meal preparation and make mealtime memorable!

To get started, install the Cook'n Recipe Organizer app for iOS, Android, Windows or Mac and create a free Cook'n cloud account. Enable the Cook'n Cook'n Recipe Organizer skill for Amazon Alexa and link the skill to your Cook'n cloud account.

Access Your Recipes on Alexa
To find a recipe, say "Alexa, ask Cook'n Recipe Organizer for my Homemade Oreo Cookie recipe" and select a recipe from the results.
